title: Mobile-Based Job Learning Innovation: Design Thinking-Enhanced Competency Development for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 Years of Practical Experience in Science Field and Basic Mobile Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Centric Learning Environments, Real-Time Collaboration Tools, and Task Performance Based on UN Agency Job Problem-Solving Cases

learning_goals: Learners design job problem-solving processes applying the five-stage design thinking framework (discovery-interpretation-ideation-experimentation-evolution) in mobile environments
Learners establish knowledge-sharing systems and implement effective communication strategies with peers using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners develop mobile learning solutions integrating gamification elements and create action plans to enhance workplace learning motivation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
